page.title: 11LEOMINSTER ANTIQUE SHOPS
page.content: {Leominster}is a busy centre for the antiques trade, attracting dealers and buyers worldwide. An important factor is the situation of a large firm of auctioneers in the town. This well established firm, Russell Baldwin and Bright, holds regular collective furniture sales and a monthly specialist antiques sale, the catalogues for which are distributed worldwide. During these sales hundreds of lots are sold for thousands of pounds. There is also a large export business in{Leominster,}with furniture regularly shipped overseas. Much of this furniture having been carefully restored by local craftsmen. Shops and markets in the town sell a variety of antiques, some specialising in one area. Perhaps the most unusual of these is a shop selling only clocks and barometers.
